nml_option.name: config_AM_tracerBudget_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member tracerBudget is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_tracerBudget_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_tracerBudget_stream_name
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the tracerBudget analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_tracerBudget_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_tracerBudget_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: tracerBudgetAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the temPlate analysis member.
